events.message: The insured reported a vehicle accident that occurred yesterday involving another car at an intersection.
The claim was classified under the Auto Accident cluster due to the involvement of a car collision.
An agent specialized in auto insurance claims has been assigned to handle the documented vehicle accident.
The insured has been sent confirmation that the claim is received and is currently in process.
Request sent for police report, photographs of the vehicle damage, and witness statements to support the claim.
The insured submitted the requested police report, accident photos, and statements from the eyewitnesses promptly.
The claims department has initiated the investigation of the auto accident claim to verify the details provided.
The investigation into the vehicle collision claim has been completed, determining fault and damage extent.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the investigation findings for the damages to the insured vehicle.
The customer responded positively to the proposed settlement amount and expressed satisfaction with the handling.
The claim for the auto accident damages was formally approved for payment after review of all documentation.
The payment covering the repair costs for the insuredâ€™s vehicle damage was issued without delay.
The auto accident claim was officially closed after payment confirmation and all requirements were met.
The documentation and records for the vehicle collision claim were archived for future reference and compliance.
